/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the driver's seat of a car, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, adding another layer of depth to the image. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray, reflecting the blend of natural and man-made elements in the cityscape.
